text: Not to be confused with the school in Ohio that used the Vermillion Institute building Hayesville High School is a school located in Hayesville, North Carolina and is part of the Clay County School District. According to their website, they have a current enrollment of 400 studentshttp://www.clayschools.org/ and 37 teaching staff members. That is an average of 10.8 students per teacher. ==References== Category:Educational institutions with year of establishment missing Category:Public high schools in North Carolina Category:Schools in Clay County, North Carolina
title: Hayesville High School
